name: project-manager
title: Project Manager
description: Manage and open your projects with multiple code editors and Claude Code
author: mcson2

commands.name: add-project
commands.title: Add Project
commands.description: Add a new project to your project manager

commands.name: open-project
commands.title: Open Project
commands.description: Open a project in your code editor and/or Terminal with Claude Code

commands.name: delete-project
commands.title: Delete Project
commands.description: Remove a project from your project manager

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
